name: gstin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gst_return_status.
Tool description: GST Return Filing Status for India
API description: Retrieve details about a GSTIN (GST number), including the latest return filing list, GST compliance classification, and HSN/SAC details.

gstin.description: The GSTIN (GST number) to retrieve details for.

content_type.description: The content type for the request. Defaults to 'application/json'.
